body_html:
I have found that the data lenght of specific label may be just one which would cause an endless loop in TripletPDRDataset . So I added the following statements:

while positive_index == index:
    if len(self.label_to_indices[label1]) <= 1:
        break
    positive_index = np.random.choice(self.label_to_indices[label1])
body:
I have found that the data lenght of specific label may be just one which would cause an endless loop in `TripletPDRDataset` . So I added the following statements:
```python
while positive_index == index:
    if len(self.label_to_indices[label1]) <= 1:
        break
    positive_index = np.random.choice(self.label_to_indices[label1])
```
